alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 2:43AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Atlantic, Cumberland, southeastern Salem and southeastern Gloucester Counties through 315 AM EDT... At 242 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairton, or near Bridgeton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vineland, Millville, Bridgeton, Cumberland, Hammonton, Buena, Laurel Lake, Estell Manor, Newfield, Newport, Dorothy, Fairton, Cedarville, Mizpah, Port Elizabeth, South Vineland, Rosenhayn, Folsom and Collings Lakes. This includes Atlantic City Expressway near mile marker 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
